channel.title: ~Guide to getting Ip Address~ (Screen shots included)
channel.description:
Hello, this guide will help you get your Ip address.
First off you'll need to go to 'start'. Then go down to 'Run' (Just plain run)
Then you should see something like this:
[IMG]http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q92/photomasterrule/Run.jpg[/img]
Ok now put in the box: Command
[IMG]http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q92/photomasterrule/Conshy.jpg[/img]
Once you have done that you should see random stuff in a box^^. Then after that put this inside the box: ipconfig/all then press enter
Once you've done that you should see a screen that says all your Address for Hamachi or w/e you use etc...
You'll see: Ip Address: ( and whatever code it is) should look like this: 5.121.2.12 (Just an example).
Now Once you've found that there you go you have your Ip address.
NOTE: to get out of run put: exit then press enter
~Stone :cool: [br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 12:11:18 PM[/size][hr]Ok well I updated it. It was a lil messed up but all fixed now!

@parad0x wrote:

Or http://ipchicken.com
Or http://whatismyip.com
[/quote]

lol you know what is weird my ips are different then what the websites say :P[/quote]
Lol noob because the ip you see is your network ip and the one on the websites is your external WAN.

item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

[quote=“Player-7, post:21, topic:41860”]

cough[/quote]
think of it that you are missing the ipconfig.exe in your system32 folder, you can search online for one(unsafe) or i can just post it. i could even make an installer for ipconfig if i wanted to, i’m bored, im going to bed, i need to get up at 5-AM tomarow(not that anyone cares), but for some reason i type a lot when i am tired. Therefore i will say one thing! the egg exploaded because the pillow went to jail! also btw, i typed this all with my eyes closed. ts not that difficult when you get used to watching recorded videos, while playing runescape. man i am so tired, i feel like going to bed, though i cannot see when i have my eyes closed, could anyone explain that/ i don’t know what you want! go waya! Ok geud night!

PS -that was spelled wrong on purpose!(geud, it is supposed to be good, but i like geud better0 bye!

Read full topic
